name: Omah Setan: Prolog
description:
OMAH SETAN : PROLOG  Can Heri unravel the mystery of the murder of Dasrul's wife? Or will he fall into a new problem?

Heri is a friend of Dasrul who wants to prove and find out what really happened to his friend, but without realizing it, he even plunged into a bigger problem, knowing that his friend turned out to be a member of the sect of worshipers of Ratu Nyai Jarit Abang.

What truth will he know? Or will he fall into the pit of hell?

Omah Satan is a horror puzzle game developed for PC platform adopting the dense environment of Resident Evil 3 and puzzles like detective games.

Basic Control :

  • WASD = Movement
  • E = Interact 
  • F = Flashlight
  • Esc = Pause

Note : This game is still concept and under development
